name: Reversinglabs A1000 v2
description: App integrates with ReversingLabs A1000 Malware Analysis Appliance APIs

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
actions.verbose: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration.

actions.description: Upload file to A1000
actions.verbose: Upload file to A1000.

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to detonate

archive_password.description: Password for the file if it is password protected

tags.description: Comma separated list of tags to assign to sample

comment.description: Comment to add to a sample

actions.description: Detonate file from url
actions.verbose: Detonate file from url.

file_url.description: URL from which the appliance should download the data

archive_password.description: Password, if file is a password-protected archive

actions.description: Check submitted url status
actions.verbose: Check submitted url status. Returns report if ready.

actions.description: Create pdf report
actions.verbose: Initiate pdf report creation.

actions.description: Check pdf report creation
actions.verbose: Check pdf report creation status.

actions.description: Download pdf report
actions.verbose: Download pdf report.

actions.description: Get TitaniumCore report
actions.verbose: Accepts a single hash string and gets the full TitaniumCore static analysis report for the requested sample.The requested sample must be present on the appliance. If the optional fields parameter is not provided in the request, all available parts of the static analysis report are returned in the response.

actions.description: Queries URL info
actions.verbose: Queries URL info.

actions.description: Queries domain info
actions.verbose: Queries domain info.

actions.description: Queries IP info
actions.verbose: Queries IP info.

actions.description: Get a list of IP-to-domain mappings
actions.verbose: Accepts an IP address string and returns a list of IP-to-domain mappings.

page_size.description: Number of elements in the response

actions.description: Get a list of URLs hosted on the requested IP address
actions.verbose: Accepts an IP address string and returns a list of URLs hosted on the requested IP address.

page_size.description: Number of elements in the response

actions.description: Get a a list of hashes and classifications for files found on the requested IP address
actions.verbose: Accepts an IP address string and returns a list of hashes and classifications for files found on the requested IP address.

page_size.description: Number of elements in the response

actions.description: Search for samples using multi-part search criteria
actions.verbose: Search for samples available on the local A1000 instance and TitaniumCloud using the Advanced Search capabilities.

only_cloud_results.description: Show only TitaniumCloud results, by default only local results are show

actions.description: Search for samples available on the TitaniumCloud
actions.verbose: All restricted words and characters must be escaped with double quotation marks. This action will work only if A1000 is set up with access to TiCloud.

start_search_date.description: The starting date for the search (later date)

end_search_date.description: The ending date for the search (earlier date)

limit.description: Get at most <limit> search results, if page is set max value is 100

page.description: Use pagination instead of aggregated getter, off by default, index starts at 1

actions.description: Search for samples available on the A1000 appliance
actions.verbose: All restricted words and characters must be escaped with double quotation marks.

limit.description: Get at most <limit> search results, if page is set max value is 100

page.description: Use pagination instead of aggregated getter, off by default, index starts at 1

actions.description: Initiate the creation of dynamic analysis PDF report
actions.verbose: Accepts a single hash string and and a report format and initiates the creation of PDF or HTML reports for samples that have gone through dynamic analysis in the ReversingLabs Cloud Sandbox.

actions.description: Get status of the report previously requested
actions.verbose: Accepts a single hash string and report format parameters that should correspond to the parameters used in the request with create_dynamic_analysis_report method. The response includes an informative message about the status of the report previously requested.

render.title: A1000 Check Dynamic Analysis Report Status

actions.description: Download previously requested dynamic analysis report in pdf
actions.verbose: Accepts a single hash string and report format parameters that should correspond to the parameters used in the request with create_dynamic_analysis_report method.

actions.description: Get a summary report for hash
actions.verbose: Get a summary report for hash.

retry.description: If set to False there will only be one try at obtaining the analysis report

fields.description: List of A1000 report 'fields' to query

include_network_threat_intelligence.description: Include network threat intelligence in the summary report

skip_reanalysis.description: Skip sample reanalysis when fetching the summary report

actions.description: Get detailed analysis report
actions.verbose: Get detailed analysis report for sample.

retry.description: If set to False there will only be one try at obtaining the analysis report

fields.description: List of A1000 report 'fields' to query

skip_reanalysis.description: Skip sample reanalysis when fetching the summary report

actions.description: Get classification for a sample
actions.verbose: Get classification for one sample. The default value of local_only is False, which, if not changed, will send a request to TitaniumCloud to get the sample. The av_scanners parameter decides if the AV scanner results will be included in the classification report.

local_only.description: Return only local samples without querying TitaniumCloud

actions.description: List existing tags for the requested sample
actions.verbose: List existing tags for the requested sample, if there are any.

render.title: A1000 Retrieve User Tags for a sample

actions.description: Add one or more user tags
actions.verbose: Add one or more User Tags to the sample, regardless of whether the sample already has any tags.

render.title: A1000 Create User Tags for a sample

actions.description: Remove one or more user tags
actions.verbose: Remove one or more User Tags from the requested sample.

render.title: A1000 Delete User Tags from a sample

actions.description: Set the classification of a sample
actions.verbose: This API allows the user to set the classification of a sample, either in TitaniumCloud or locally on the A1000.

risk_score.description: Risk score to set for classification

threat_platform.description: Threat platform to set, must be on the supported list

threat_type.description: Threat type to set, must be on the supported list

threat_name.description: Threat name to set, must be on the supported list

actions.description: Delete the (user set) classification of a sample
actions.verbose: This API allows the user to delete the classification of a sample, either in TitaniumCloud or locally on the A1000.

system.description: Where to delete the desired classification

actions.description: Get a list of YARA rulesets that are on the A1000
actions.verbose: For every ruleset in the list, the output includes additional info such as: rule name, number of matches, last matched date, and more.

render.title: A1000 Retrieve a list of YARA rulesets on the appliance

actions.description: Get the full contents of the requested ruleset
actions.verbose: Get the full contents of the requested ruleset in raw text. All rulesets can be retrieved.

render.title: A1000 Retrieve the contents of a YARA ruleset

actions.description: Retrieve the list of YARA matches
actions.verbose: Retrieve the list of YARA matches (local & cloud) for requested ruleset. Names are case-sensitive.

render.title: A1000 Retrieve YARA matches for specified rulesets

actions.description: Creates a new YARA ruleset if it doesn't exist
actions.verbose: Creates a new YARA ruleset if it doesn't exist. If it exists a new revision is created. TiCloud rules cannot be updated using this API.

publish.description: Publish to C1000 in the same cluster

render.title: A1000 Create or Update YARA ruleset

actions.description: Delete a specific YARA ruleset and its matches
actions.verbose: Delete a specific YARA ruleset and its matches from the appliance.

publish.description: Publish to C1000 in the same cluster

actions.description: Enable or disable a ruleset on the appliance
actions.verbose: Administrators can manage any ruleset while regular A1000 users can only manage their own.

publish.description: Publish to C1000 in the same cluster

actions.description: Get the current synchronization time
actions.verbose: Provides information about the current synchronization status for TiCloud enabled rulesets.

actions.description: Modify the TiCloud sync time for TiCloud enabled rulesets
actions.verbose: Modify the TiCloud sync time for TiCloud enabled rulesets. Time parameter must be a UTC timestamp <YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss>.

render.title: A1000 YARA Set ruleset synchronization time

actions.action: yara start or stop local retro scan
actions.description: Allow users to start or stop the Local Retro scan on the appliance
actions.verbose: Allow users to start or stop the Local Retro scan on the appliance.

render.title: A1000 YARA Start/Stop a Local Retro scan

actions.description: Allow users to start, stop or clear a Cloud Retro scan
actions.verbose: Start/Stop or Clear a Cloud Retro scan for a specified ruleset on the A1000.

render.title: A1000 YARA Start/Stop a Cloud Retro scan

actions.description: Allow users to check the status of a Local Retro scan
actions.verbose: The response indicates the current state of Local Retro scan, time and date when the latest Local Retro scan was started and/or stopped, and a list of previous Local Retro scans with same details.

actions.description: Allow users to check the status of Cloud Retro scan for specified ruleset
actions.verbose: The response indicates the current state of Cloud Retro, time and date when the latest Cloud Retro scan was started and/or stopped, and a list of previous Cloud Retro scans with the same details.

actions.description: Get a list of containers from which the requested samples has been extracted
actions.verbose: Get a list of all top-level containers from which the requested samples have been extracted during analysis. If a requested hash doesn't have a container, it will not be included in the response.

render.title: A1000 List containers for every requested hash

actions.description: Delete the sample with the requested hash value
actions.verbose: All related data, including extracted samples and metadata, will be deleted from the current A1000 instance.

hash.description: Hash of a sample to be deleted

actions.description: Download files extracted from local sample
actions.verbose: The files are obtained through the unpacking process during sample analysis with the TitaniumCore static analysis engine.

hash.description: Hash of a sample to be deleted

actions.description: Submit a set of samples that already exist on the A1000
actions.verbose: Submit a set of samples that were previously uploaded to be analyzed with one or more supported services.

rl_cloud_sandbox_platform.description: Platform on which the samples should be detonated

render.title: A1000 Reanalyze multiple samples with selected services
